channel.title: Kermit|Winkler County|Texas|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Kermit|Winkler County|Texas|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: TX-18 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on TX-18 south. Distance to Monahans and Fort Stockton.

item.title: TX-302 East at TX-18
item.description: TX-302 east at TX-18. Use TX-18 south for Monahans; TX-18 north for Jal, NM.

item.title: TX-18 South at TX-302
item.description: TX-18 south at TX-302. TX-302 is a truck route through Kermit.

item.title: TX-18 South at TX-302
item.description: TX-18 south at TX-302. Use TX-302 east for Odessa; TX-302 west for Mentone.

item.title: TX-18 South Approaching TX-302
item.description: TX-18 south approaching TX-302 in Kermit.

item.title: TX-18 South/TX-115 West at TX-18
item.description: TX-18 South/TX-115 West at TX-18/TX-115 Split. Turn left for TX-18 south to Monahans; continue straight for TX-115 east to Andrews.

item.title: TX-18 South at TX-115
item.description: TX-18 south at TX-115. Turn left for TX-18 South/TX-115 East; turn right for TX-115 West.

item.title: TX-18 South at TX-115
item.description: TX-18 south at TX-115. Turn right on TX-115 west for Wink; left on TX-115 west/TX-18 south for Monahans. TX-18 joins TX-115 for a few blocks through Kermit.

item.title: TX-18 South Approaching TX-115
item.description: TX-18 south approaching TX-115. Turn left to continue south on TX-18.

item.title: TX-18 South Approaching TX-115
item.description: TX-18 south approaching TX-115 in Kermit.

item.title: TX-18 South - Kermit City Limit
item.description: Kermit City Limit on TX-18 south. Population 5,708.
